item.title: Teaching a Machine to Learn NYC Airbnb Prices
item.description: Using Airbnb By now, most Gen Z and millenials have heard of or used Airbnb for a range of many reasons, such as looking for a place to crash or taking a vacation. I believe what won the consumer’s attention over hotels was the fact that you are getting the “homey” setting and privacy while away on vacation instead of a hotel environment. I realize not everyone wants to part ways with room service, benefits of a having full-service bar in the lobby, pool & spas, sometimes a gym, and the 100+ channels, but when comparing the prices and the extra sq.
